search.title: Field-Specific Search
search.description: You can search for specific fields using two different operators: colon (:) for partial matches and equals (=) for exact matches.

examples.title: Field Examples
examples.playerField: Use 'player:Name' for partial match or 'player=Name' for exact match
examples.videoField: Use 'video:Link' for partial match or 'video=Link' for exact match

operators.title: Search Operators
operators.description: You can combine multiple search conditions using operators.

examples.title: Operator Examples
examples.and: Search for passes that match both conditions (AND)
examples.or: Search for passes that match either condition (OR)
examples.complex: Complex search combining AND and OR conditions

points.caseSensitive: Searches are case-insensitive - 'PLAYER' and 'player' will give the same results
points.partial: Colon (:) allows partial matches - 'player:yo' will match 'yoonsu' and 'yoon'
points.exact: Equals (=) requires exact matches - 'player=yoon' will only match 'yoon'
points.spaces: Spaces are allowed in search terms - 'player:Epic player' works
points.order: The order of conditions doesn't matter within each group
